mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS 'userId' , USER_NM AS 'userNm' , PASSWD AS 'passWd' , NICK AS 'nick' , PHONE AS 'phone' , EMAIL AS 'email' FROM atworks_user WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO atworks_user (USER_ID, USER_NM, PASSWD, NICK, PHONE, EMAIL) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userNm}, #{passWd}, #{nick}, #{phone}, #{email} )
